name: Bottle Cap Master
description:
Bottle Cap Master is a game based on the word #bottlecapchallenge. We know for sure that you have long wanted to participate! Train every day and become a master in knocking the caps off the bottles. Managed your character, control the power of the swing and surprise your friends with your skill!
Bottle Cap Master - be in trend not only in real life, but also in the in-app on your smartphone.
